english.segment1: Spirit of heaven, flood over me. Forming Christ in all that I do. Turn every sinful desire in me. Into holy passion for You
english.segment2: O Spirit of God, come down. Let mercy and grace abound. My passionate prayer shall be. Christ in me
english.segment3: Spirit of beauty and holiness. Come refine with fire from above. Till I am cast in Your righteousness. And I love the things that You love
english.segment4: O Spirit of God, come down. Let mercy and grace abound. My passionate prayer shall be. Christ in me
english.segment5: Breathe Your forgiveness when darkness falls. And my heart is heavy with sin. Fill me with faith for the higher cause. Of the ceaseless praise of the King
english.segment6: O Spirit of God, come down. Let mercy and grace abound. My passionate prayer shall be. Christ in me
